mapper.select: SELECT PCA.CCODE AS CCODE, PCA.PCODE AS PCODE, PROD.PNAME AS PNAME, PROD.PBRAND AS PBRAND, PROD.PPRICE AS PPRICE, PROD.PDATE AS PDATE, PROD.ENABLED AS ENABLED, PRODIMG.PCOLOR AS PCOLOR, PRODIMG.IMGURL1 AS IMGURL1, PRODIMG.IMGURL2 AS IMGURL2, PRODIMG.IMGURL3 AS IMGURL3, PRODIMG.COLORURL AS COLORURL FROM PCATEGORY PCA JOIN PRODUCT PROD ON PCA.PCODE = PROD.PCODE JOIN PRODUCTIMG PRODIMG ON PROD.PCODE = PRODIMG.PCODE WHERE CCODE LIKE #{ccode} ORDER BY ENABLED
